hero.title: Join the Open Source Communities in Asia!

text.content:
## About the OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC 

[The OpenInfra Summit Asia](https://openinfra.dev/summit/) and OCP Regional Summit APAC are two community-powered events co-located in Suwon, South Korea this year! To build the next decade of open infrastructure, OpenInfra Summits will be developed by the community for the community. 

These events are being organized by the OpenInfra and OCP Korea community organizers in collaboration with fellow organizers from various countries in Asia. 

Join the leading open source software and hardware communities on September 3 & 4, 2024 in Suwon, South Korea. In addition to sessions on projects directly supported by the OpenInfra Foundation—OpenStack, StarlingX, Kata Containers, Airship, Zuul, and OpenInfra Labs—the OpenInfra Summit will be co-located with the Open Compute Project (OCP), a collaborative community focused on redesigning hardware technology to efficiently support the growing demands on compute infrastructure. 

The OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC will be a limited-capacity, sellout event. 

OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC Pricing

Full Access Pass: ₩70,000 KRW ($60 USD) 

### OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC Venue

The OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC is being hosted at the [Suwon Convention Center](https://maps.app.goo.gl/bn52sGkFrqcT3dpX6). Learn more about the venue [here](https://www.scc.or.kr/site-map/).

### OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC Schedule

OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC attendees will engage in 100+ sessions around infrastructure use cases like cloud computing, edge computing, hardware enablement, and security. The event is focused on helping users compose, integrate, and operate these different technologies to solve real problems at scale. 

There will also be a strong focus on over 30 other open-source technologies relevant to infrastructure operators, including Linux, Kubernetes, Docker, Ansible, Ceph, Istio, Envoy, OpenContrail, ONAP and many more.

The CFP for the OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC is now live! [Learn more here](https://openinfrafoundation.formstack.com/forms/openinfra_asia_summit_2024).

### Code of Conduct

We are a diverse community of professionals, and the OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC organizers are dedicated to providing an inclusive and safe Summit experience for everyone. View the [OpenInfra Summit Code of Conduct](https://openinfra.dev/legal/code-of-conduct) for more information.

Have Questions?

Contact the OpenInfra Foundation and OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC organizers [here](http://summit@openinfra.dev).
